title: Practical Competency Development Through Feedback-Driven Online Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Online learning experience and foundational expertise in social sciences
context.additional_context: Practical skill-focused learning environment using VR-based simulations, with real-time feedback and collaboration support via LMS and digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can analyze formative assessment results to accurately diagnose 80%+ of their knowledge gaps.
Feedback-based learning activities improve core concept application skills by 30%+ compared to pre-assessment.
Collaborative problem-solving tasks in VR simulation environments are successfully completed at a 90%+ rate.
Knowledge acquired during learning is integrated into practical projects at a 70%+ rate.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
